## ARIAGlobalStatesAndProperties.ariaDisabled property

Indicates that the element is perceivable but disabled, so it is not editable or otherwise operable.

[https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.1/\#aria-disabled](https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.1/#aria-disabled)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ariaDisabled: "true" | "false" | string | null;
```

## Remarks

HTML Attribute: aria-disabled
